scripts.prepare:mainnet: node scripts/writeContractAddresses.js mainnet && mustache config/mainnet.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && yarn codegen && yarn checkhandlers
scripts.prepare:rinkeby: node scripts/writeContractAddresses.js rinkeby && mustache config/rinkeby.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && yarn codegen && yarn checkhandlers
scripts.deploy:rinkeby: yarn prepare:rinkeby && graph deploy --node https://api.studio.thegraph.com/deploy/ juicebox-dev-rinkeby
scripts.deploy:mainnet-v2-dev: yarn prepare:mainnet && graph deploy --node https://api.studio.thegraph.com/deploy/ juicebox-v2-dev-mainnet
scripts.deploy:rinkeby-v2-dev: yarn prepare:rinkeby && graph deploy --node https://api.studio.thegraph.com/deploy/ juicebox-v2-dev-rinkeby
